Hi,

Since my App.xaml is in the Shell project and my views are in a different project, when I create a new resource (e.g. a brush....) in Blend, it doesn't write the xaml in App.xaml.

I can see it in Blend though so I can copy-paste manually the code. That works, however visual studio still underlines in red wherever I use the resource because it can't be found.

At runtime of course everything works fine. I was wondering if there is a workaround ? I don't really want to copy-paste manually each time I create a resource.e

 

Thanks

You could vote in that thread and the team might take this suggestion into account for a future version.
